channel.title: OSP (Old School PK) Last update: 25th May SLAYER & C WARS!
channel.description:
Welcome to my newest project! I plan to make an old school server from scratch, using no modern techniques, (PvP armour, D claws etc.) I will use Godswords and Bandos, but nothing from then onwards. The main point of this is to bring back the early days of me playing Runescape, so I look to add PKing, Quests and Skills.
Update Log! [code] 24th May - Started! 25th May - Slayer Finished - Added a starting train spot[/code]
Key: Red - Not Started Orange - In progress Green - Done! Combat (Full attack, defence, strength and prayer. Magic and Range Fix NPC Clipping Cooks Assistant Quest Full Slayer Dorics Quest Interfaces when level up Fix X Logging Full Castle Wars
Slayer System: [IMG]http://i818.photobucket.com/albums/zz104/KrazyKarl5/4.jpg[/img] - Saves task and task number to char file.
Castle Wars: [IMG]http://i818.photobucket.com/albums/zz104/KrazyKarl5/2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i818.photobucket.com/albums/zz104/KrazyKarl5/3.jpg[/img] Capture flag and score works, timer and it is safe if you die. Explosive potions and Bandages work!
I will add more later, this is just what I am working on now.

@krazy_karl wrote:

Welcome to my newest project! I plan to make an old school server from scratch, using no modern techniques, (PvP armour, D claws etc.) I will use Godswords and Bandos, but nothing from then onwards. The main point of this is to bring back the early days of me playing Runescape, so I look to add PKing, Quests and Skills.

Update Log!

24th May - Started! 25th May - Slayer Finished - Added a starting train spot

Key:
Red - Not Started
Orange - In progress
Green - Done!
Combat (Full attack, defence, strength and prayer.
Magic and Range
Fix NPC Clipping
Cooks Assistant Quest
Full Slayer
Dorics Quest
Interfaces when level up
Fix X Logging
Full Castle Wars

Slayer System:
- Saves task and task number to char file.

Castle Wars:


Capture flag and score works, timer and it is safe if you die. Explosive potions and Bandages work!

I will add more later, this is just what I am working on now.
